publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1258 Nick Johnston: Congratulations to Shirley Robertson—That the Parliament congratulates all Olympic medallists and extends special congratulations to Shirley Robertson from Menstrie in Clackmannanshire for winning the first ever gold medal for a British woman sailor and the first individual gold for a Scottish woman since 1920.
S1M-1258 Congratulations to Shirley Robertson (lodged on 10 October 2000) Bill Aitken*

S1M-1258 Nick Johnston: Congratulations to Shirley Robertson—That the Parliament congratulates all Olympic medallists and extends special congratulations to Shirley Robertson from Menstrie in Clackmannanshire for winning the first ever gold medal for a British woman sailor and the first individual gold for a Scottish woman since 1920. Supported by: Bill Aitken
S1M-1258 Congratulations to Shirley Robertson (lodged on 10 October 2000) Alex Fergusson*, Irene McGugan*
S1M-1258 Congratulations to Shirley Robertson (lodged on 10 October 2000) Christine Grahame*
S1M-1258 Congratulations to Shirley Robertson (lodged on 10 October 2000) Phil Gallie*
S1M-1258 Congratulations to Shirley Robertson (lodged on 10 October 2000) Mary Scanlon*

S1M-1258 Nick Johnston: Congratulations to Shirley Robertson—That the Parliament congratulates all Olympic medallists and extends special congratulations to Shirley Robertson from Menstrie in Clackmannanshire for winning the first ever gold medal for a British woman sailor and the first individual gold for a Scottish woman since 1920. Supported by: Bill Aitken, Alex Fergusson, Irene McGugan, Christine Grahame, Phil Gallie, Mary Scanlon, Mr Keith Harding*
S1M-1258 Congratulations to Shirley Robertson (lodged on 10 October 2000) Michael Russell*, David McLetchie*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S1M-1258 Congratulations to Shirley Robertson (lodged on 10 October 2000) Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-1258 Nick Johnston: Congratulations to Shirley Robertson—That the Parliament congratulates all Olympic medallists and extends special congratulations to Shirley Robertson from Menstrie in Clackmannanshire for winning the first ever gold medal for a British woman sailor and the first individual gold for a Scottish woman since 1920. Supported by: Bill Aitken, Alex Fergusson, Irene McGugan, Christine Grahame, Phil Gallie, Mary Scanlon, Mr Keith Harding, Michael Russell, David McLetchie, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Tommy Sheridan
S1M-1258 Congratulations to Shirley Robertson (lodged on 10 October 2000) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*

S1M-1258 Nick Johnston: Congratulations to Shirley Robertson-That the Parliament congratulates all Olympic medallists and extends special congratulations to Shirley Robertson from Menstrie in Clackmannanshire for winning the first ever gold medal for a British woman sailor and the first individual gold for a Scottish woman since 1920. Supported by: Bill Aitken, Alex Fergusson, Irene McGugan, Christine Grahame, Phil Gallie, Mary Scanlon, Mr Keith Harding, Michael Russell, David McLetchie, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Tommy Sheridan, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh
S1M-1258 Congratulations to Shirley Robertson (lodged on 10 October 2000) Fergus Ewing*

S1M-1258 Nick Johnston: Congratulations to Shirley Robertson-That the Parliament congratulates all Olympic medallists and extends special congratulations to Shirley Robertson from Menstrie in Clackmannanshire for winning the first ever gold medal for a British woman sailor and the first individual gold for a Scottish woman since 1920. Supported by: Bill Aitken, Alex Fergusson, Irene McGugan, Christine Grahame, Phil Gallie, Mary Scanlon, Mr Keith Harding, Michael Russell, David McLetchie, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Tommy Sheridan, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Fergus Ewing

S1M-1258 Nick Johnston: Congratulations to Shirley Robertson—That the Parliament congratulates all Olympic medallists and extends special congratulations to Shirley Robertson from Menstrie in Clackmannanshire for winning the first ever gold medal for a British woman sailor and the first individual gold for a Scottish woman since 1920. Supported by: Bill Aitken, Alex Fergusson, Irene McGugan, Christine Grahame, Phil Gallie, Mary Scanlon, Mr Keith Harding, Michael Russell, David McLetchie, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Tommy Sheridan, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Fergus Ewing

S1M-1258 Nick Johnston: Congratulations to Shirley Robertson-That the Parliament congratulates all Olympic medallists and extends special congratulations to Shirley Robertson from Menstrie in Clackmannanshire for winning the first ever gold medal for a British woman sailor and the first individual gold for a Scottish woman since 1920. Supported by: Bill Aitken, Alex Fergusson, Irene McGugan, Christine Grahame, Phil Gallie, Mary Scanlon, Mr Keith Harding, Michael Russell, David McLetchie, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Tommy Sheridan, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Fergus Ewing

S1M-1258 Nick Johnston: Congratulations to Shirley Robertson-That the Parliament congratulates all Olympic medallists and extends special congratulations to Shirley Robertson from Menstrie in Clackmannanshire for winning the first ever gold medal for a British woman sailor and the first individual gold for a Scottish woman since 1920. Supported by: Bill Aitken, Alex Fergusson, Irene McGugan, Christine Grahame, Phil Gallie, Mary Scanlon, Mr Keith Harding, Michael Russell, David McLetchie, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Tommy Sheridan, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Fergus Ewing
